alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central New Hanover and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holden Beach, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Shallotte, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Yaupon Beach, Ocean Crest Pier, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport, Civie Town, Long Beach, Varnamtown and Dosher Memorial Hospital. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 14 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick
